content: भंगिः --गी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Breaking, fracture, breach, division. {@--2@} Undulation. {@--3@} Bending, contracting; दृग्भंगीभिः प्रथममथुरा संगमे चुंबितोऽस्मि <ls>Ud. S. 13.</ls> {@--4@} A wave. {@--5@} A flood, current. {@--6@} A crooked path, tortuous or winding course. {@--7@} A circumlocutory or round-about way of speaking or acting, periphrasis; भंग्यंतरेण कथनात् <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; इति भंग्या व्यज्यते-कथ्यते &c.; बहुभंगिविशारदः <ls>Dk.</ls> {@--8@} A pretext, disguise, semblance; यः पांचजन्यपतिबिंबभंग्या धारांभसः फेनमिव व्यनक्ति <ls>Vikr. 1. 1.</ls> {@--9@} Trick, fraud, deceit. {@--10@} Irony. {@--11@} Repartee, wit. {@--12@} A step; <ls>R. 13. 69.</ls> {@--13@} An interval. {@--14@} Modesty.
